Flow.description: VS 10/13/25: Update SQO for Contact Stage 10/24/25: Add Contract Data Table to Input Screen for Contract Selection

formulas.name: NameFormula
formulas.expression: IF( {!Opportunity_Type} = 'Expansion', {!Get_Account.Name} + " - Expansion - " + TEXT({!Expected_Close_Date}), IF( {!Opportunity_Type} = 'New Business', {!Get_Account.Name} + " - New Business - " + TEXT({!Expected_Close_Date}), {!Get_Account.Name} + " - Renewal - " + TEXT({!Expected_Close_Date}) ))

formulas.name: TermMonthsCalculation
formulas.expression: (12 * (YEAR({!Desired_Date}) - YEAR({!Start_Date}))) + (MONTH({!Desired_Date}) - MONTH({!Start_Date})) + IF( AND( DAY({!Start_Date}) = 1, DAY({!Desired_Date}) = CASE( MONTH({!Desired_Date}), 1, 31, 2, IF( MOD(YEAR({!Desired_Date}), 4) = 0 && (MOD(YEAR({!Desired_Date}), 100) != 0 || MOD(YEAR({!Desired_Date}), 400) = 0), 29, 28 ), 3, 31, 4, 30, 5, 31, 6, 30, 7, 31, 8, 31, 9, 30, 10, 31, 11, 30, 12, 31, 0 ) ), 1, ROUND( (DAY({!Desired_Date}) - DAY({!Start_Date})) / CASE( MONTH({!Start_Date}), 1, 31, 2, IF( MOD(YEAR({!Start_Date}), 4) = 0 && (MOD(YEAR({!Start_Date}), 100) != 0 || MOD(YEAR({!Start_Date}), 400) = 0), 29, 28 ), 3, 31, 4, 30, 5, 31, 6, 30, 7, 31, 8, 31, 9, 30, 10, 31, 11, 30, 12, 31, 0 ), 2 ) )

Flow.label: Opportunity Creation Screen Flow

fields.name: Help_Text
fields.fieldText:
Select the Expansion Start Date

Please choose a start date for the expansion. The date must match the end date of the current active contract.

fields.name: inputtext
fields.fieldText: Provide details to create a New Opportunity ðŸš€
